snippet: To reduce response times, the New York Police Department will take responsibility for fielding the complaints from the American Society for the Prevention of Cruelty to Animals.
abstract: American Society for Prevention of Cruelty to Animals says that New York Police Department will take responsibility for fielding animal abuse cases, incorporating enforcement of animal cruelty laws into routine, everyday enforcement work; ASPCA has responded to animal abuse complaints since its founding 147 years ago, but has struggled to cope with increase in cases since early 2000s.
lead_paragraph: To reduce response times, the New York Police Department will take responsibility for fielding the complaints from the American Society for the Prevention of Cruelty to Animals.

headline.main: Animal Abuse Calls Will Now Go to Police
headline.print_headline: Animal Abuse Calls Will Now Go to Police

keywords.value: American Society for the Prevention of Cruelty to Animals
keywords.name: organizations
